subject: How to test using XML and XSLT?
msgSnippet: Hi, I am trying to write some test cases but I am not sure how to do it. I have a program which takes a XML input file and runs it through an XSLT process.

Hi,

I am trying to write some test cases but I am not sure how to do it.

I have a program which takes a XML input file and runs it through an 
XSLT process.  

What is the best way to test that this has been achieved sucessfully?

Any input on this subject or a link to a page which gives guidelines 
would be useful 

Thanks
